Description: 1990s Charvel Surfcaster Up for sale is a rare and now discontinued 1990s Charvel Surfcaster in its original and beautiful "Star-Glo" cherry sunburst finish. Made in Japan, shark fin inlays, dual lipstick single-coil pickups, and a whole lotta vibe. These have become increasingly popular over the last few years and are truly a unique alternative to the instruments Jackson is typically known for. Entirely original less one replaced pot. Overall in excellent plus condition less some light play wear and a few minor dings. Comes complete with a gig bag, no trem arm with this one. Year: 1990s.Model: SurfcasterSerial: 374329.Finish: "Star-Glo" Cherry Sunburst.Case: Gig Bag.Weight: 7lbs. 10oz.Condition: Excellent plus condition.Modifications: None.Comments: Rare and now discontinued '90s Surfcaster in its original Star-Glo finish!
